synopsis.text:
Barely into adulthood, Alice Hayashi becomes the youngest person to embark on a lunar voyage, only to have her dreams shattered when her spacecraft crashes back to Earth. Miraculously surviving the wreckage, Alice discovers she has been mysteriously catapulted 30 years into the future, where a seemingly unstoppable dictator, Nero, reigns supreme with his malevolent supercomputer, SS10X.

As Alice navigates this dystopian wasteland, she finds herself pursued by Nero's relentless army of metallic warriors. In her desperate search for answers, she crosses paths with the compassionate Yuan and the unexpectedly feisty robot Maria. Together, they embark on a perilous journey to unravel the enigma surrounding Alice's past and locate her long-lost parents.

Their quest takes an unexpected turn when they are captured by a resistance group led by the enigmatic scientist, Nicolai. It is here that Alice learns the shocking truth: she is Nero's biological mother, making her the chosen one capable of toppling his tyrannical regime. With the weight of the world on her shoulders, Alice must confront her own flesh and blood to restore peace and reclaim the future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
